title: Junior Explorer Kit
desc: This kit contains a combination of Arts & Crafts and Aeromodelling activities. It helps encourage their problem solving skills and abstract symbolic reasoning. It assists in acquiring hand-eye co-ordination and fine motor skills and improves focus and concentration on trivial details.
include: Photo Magnet Kit, Sequin Card Kit, Balsa wood Glider Kit, Paper Plane Kit, Ready-to-fly Glider
